Various features are combined in a RC Dino car, Rc Car not only cultivate children's hobbies and interests but also cultivate their operation sensitivity ability with endless joy, making it the most interesting gift for children. 🎮【2.4GHz Anti-interference Control】With a high speed driving speed, 2.4GHz 40 meters control range, and easy-to-operate remote control, 1:14 RC dinosaur cars trucks for kids boys Age 4-7 8-12 to race together at the same time, this remote control car is suitable for children's birthday gifts, children's day gifts, Easter gifts, Halloween gifts, Christmas gifts or any other occasion. TIPS: When replacing the new battery, please turn off the dinosaur car and remote control switches at the same time, 2. Then turn on two switches again, and connect the signal for use.

🦖【Super Long Game Time】The RC trucks comes with 3.7V 1200mAh rechargeable batteries for remote control monster truck dinosaur car toys for boys kids 6-12 to give you over 40 minutes of non-stop playing when fully charged, you can recharge the battery in a variety of ways : computer, power bank, power adapter, socket, etc. Charging time is about 2h for battery with a USB charging cable.

🦖【Perfect Gaming Experiences】Our remote control cars dinosaur toys for boys kids 4-7 8-12 not only can move forward/backward 360°rotation like a real car, but also make a spray from the dinosaur mouth, accompanied by realistic dinosaur sounds and lights.This RC car is suitable for most terrains and easily driving such as lawns, gravel, dirt, rock, on the beach, allowing children to play with it in most environments.

🎁【Perfect GIFTS】 Fascinating birthday gifts for your child, grandchild, niece, or nephew etc. Our RC dino Trucks leave a memorable first impression, RC Car not only cultivate children's hobbies and interests but also cultivate their operation ability with endless joy.if you have any problem about RC cars, please contact with us by email,we will give you a satisfied answer in 24 hours.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 122 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dino R/C Christmas Favorite
reviews.reviewText: My son asked for an R/C dino for Christmas. The one he had originally picked out had horrible reviews so I did a little digging on my own to find something better. I came across this one, and the reviews looked promising. Boy am I glad I trusted me instincts and went with this one. It was a huge hit! This R/C can go front and back, side to side, and in circles. It's quick and even blows "smoke." It lights up and plays music, too. The music is really my only complaint. It's very loud and there isn't any volume control. At first it's not bothersome, but after listening to it for long periods and can become too much. Otherwise, it's a great toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Regalo para mi nieto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While this isn't the kind of remote controlled car that you will take outside and tackle uneven terrain with, it's a fun inside model with some very impressive features -- the smoke in particular if very fun. Controls seem reliable and in my testing the batteries lasted as long as I'd hoped. Build quality and graphics are average, but the features and theming here nudge this above average for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves it! Great purchase!
reviews.reviewText: My son had so much fun with this when he played it with his grandpa. It's a very easy to set up and use. The remote control offered the usual R/C actions and even has smoke emission which my son found to be very cool. The only thing is I think with its type of material and how it's made - it's definitely just made for indoor play. I don't think this can survive grass or any uneven terrain. So far, we haven't encountered any problems with it. If you're looking for a toy gift then we recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely entertaining! Lots of fun!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My son and I love this car. It lights up. It makes roaring sounds, and plays music. It even dances. Plus, it sprays smoke out of its mouth when it roars. It's easy to control, an its movements are swift and smooth. It can move sideways, diagonal, and of course, forwards and backwards. This is not the kind of RC car that can jump off of a ramp, but it does plenty of awesome moves that even a regular stunt car couldn't do. This dino car is seriously impressive. I think every child should have an RC car like this, and that is not a statement I make lightly. Lol. This is one of the best RC cars I have ever seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun but noisy!
reviews.reviewText: My nephew (and my dogs) just love this Dino truck!! It came partially charged so we were able to get it going right away. Plus the fact that it charges via USB makes it really convenient to recharge when needed. Much easier than finding a screwdriver to change a battery. It’s fast, it smokes and plays some crazy sounds - that being the downfall for us adults! The Dino roars are consistent even when stopped. This is great for limited time periods of play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooler than expected- Music is mixed bag
reviews.reviewText: We have a little stunt car that zips around and is lots of fun. This is more like a showboat with earworm techno music. The kids love them both, and the cat is beside himself. My toddler goes to bed and wakes up asking for the Dino car. From pre-k to 4th grade this car has been quite a hit!Although the kids love it, I’d be hesitant to gift it since the parents might not love it. The techno music is good fun, but 10 minutes of anything on repeat becomes grating. The Dino continues to roar even when it isn’t being driven. Anyone with a child knows that the level of background noise can become a bit much. We may end up relegating this to the playroom, but for now the kids are having great fun, and the cat is learning the limits of what he can hunt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dinosaur remote control car
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice remote control car for a child. It does the common movements like moving forward, reverse and turning and it includes blowing smoke. I just wish that there was a volume control on the noise as kids love to constantly play these types of sounds. This is a recommended buy.
